page.title: 20Contributors
page.content:
The contributions for this work have been written by children from Bakewell Methodist Junior School. Some additional information was supplied by Lady Manners School, Bakewell. Individual contributors and their ages are acknowledged below.
Pages 1,2 & 4: S. Allen (Lady Manners) Page 3: L. Brooks (aged 10) Page 5: J. Thompson (aged 10) Page 6: J. Strath (9) Pages 7,12 & 13: Class 3V (B.M.J.S.) Page 8: K. Richmond (10) Page 9: M. Muscroft & J. Belding (9) Page 10: T. MacMillan (10) Page 11: L. Brooks & H. Wright (10) Page 14: M. Hodgson (8) Photographs: Mr. P. Vincent
Bakewell: September 1985
